SPDataList.c:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USP_DATALIST_INTERACTION_EXTENSION as set nocount on;
select USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION.[ID], USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSIONLETTERTYPECODE.DESCRIPTION, USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSIONLETTERCHILDVERSIONCODE.DESCRIPTION, USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSIONFULFILLMENTSTATUSCODE.DESCRIPTION, USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION.[RESENDCODE], USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION.[EFTBROCHURE], USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION.[DEPARTEDCHILDID], USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION.[UNAVILABLECHILDID], USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION.[DOUBLESPONSOREDCHILDID], USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION.[TRANSFERCHILDID], USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION.[PREVIOUSCHILDPROJECTID], USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION.[PREVIOUSBIRTHDATE], USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION.[PREVIOUSNAME] from dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION left outer join dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSIONLETTERTYPECODE on USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION.[LETTERTYPECODEID] = USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSIONLETTERTYPECODE.ID left outer join dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSIONLETTERCHILDVERSIONCODE on USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION.[LETTERCHILDVERSIONCODEID] = USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSIONLETTERCHILDVERSIONCODE.ID left outer join dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSIONFULFILLMENTSTATUSCODE on USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION.[FULFILLMENTSTATUSCODEID] = USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSIONFULFILLMENTSTATUSCODE.ID
